QueenMod:CommonPower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You applied #b
keyword.
keywords.

QueenMod:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b
enemy.
enemies.

QueenMod:Nectar.NAME: Nectar
DESCRIPTIONS: Spend to use more potent effects

QueenMod:Swarm.NAME: Swarm
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b Block

QueenMod:SwarmE.NAME: Swarmed Enemy
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, lose #b HP

QueenMod:HoneyPower.NAME: Energized Bees
DESCRIPTIONS: Honeybees gain #b energy when played.

QueenMod:DefenderPower.NAME: Royal Defenders
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked, automatically uses
a Bumblebee to gain its Block.
up to #b Bumblebees to gain their Block.

QueenMod:StingerPower.NAME: Sharpened Stingers
DESCRIPTIONS: Hornets deal #b more damage.

QueenMod:PollinatePower.NAME: Pollinated
DESCRIPTIONS: When taking attack damage, the Queen gains #b*2 Nectar.

QueenMod:SwarmTacticsPower.NAME: Swarm Tactics
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a card, gain #b Swarm.

QueenMod:StrategicGeniusPower.NAME: Strategic Genius
DESCRIPTIONS: When you draw a card, gain #b Strength this turn only.

QueenMod:HeartOfTheSwarm.NAME: Heart of the Swarm
DESCRIPTIONS: Command a powerful swarm. It follows the targets of your cards, granting you block and damaging enemies at the end of the turn.

QueenMod:GrowingSwarmPower.NAME: Gathering Swarm...
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b Swarm.

QueenMod:OrganizedWorkForcePower.NAME: Organized Work Force
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, add
a Drone to your Draw Pile.
#b Drones to your Draw Pile.

QueenMod:QueenFlightPower.NAME: Flight
DESCRIPTIONS: Take 50% reduced damage. If you take attack damage, lose Flight. At the end of your turn, spend 3 Nectar or lose Flight.
Take 50% reduced damage. If you take attack damage, lose Flight. At the end of your turn, spend 2 Nectar or lose Flight.

QueenMod:FocusedSwarm.NAME: Focused Swarm
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b Block. Will not move this turn.

QueenMod:FocusedSwarmE.NAME: Focused Swarm
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, lose #b HP. Will not move this turn.

QueenMod:FlightDrain.NAME: Nectar Drain
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, lose #b Nectar or lose 1 Flight.

QueenMod:BlitzDrain.NAME: Nectar Drain
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, lose #b Nectar or lose 2 Strength and Dexterity.

QueenMod:HornetCommanderPower.NAME: Hornet's Command
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a Hive card, deal #b damage to a random enemy.

QueenMod:BumbleBeeCommanderPower.NAME: Bumblebee's Command
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a Hive card, gain #b block next turn.

QueenMod:AttackNextTurnPower.NAME: Next Turn Attack
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, add #b random Attacks from your draw pile to the top.

QueenMod:SkillNextTurnPower.NAME: Next Turn Skill
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, add #b random Skills from your draw pile to the top.

QueenMod:ReinforcementsPower.NAME: Reinforcements
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, play a Hornet, Bumblebee or Honeybee from your draw pile.

QueenMod:DroneArmyPower.NAME: Drone Army
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a Drone, gain #b Swarm.

QueenMod:HoneyShieldPower.NAME: Honey Shield
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain Nectar, gain #b block.

QueenMod:AggressionPower.NAME: Aggression Policy
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have more attacks than skills and powers, attacks are played #b+1 times.

QueenMod:IndustryPower.NAME: Industry
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b Nectar. For every 5 Industry, also draw a card.
